news_header: An installation error at the Naantali power plant led to the incorrect channeling of waste water into the toilet drain, affecting both domestic and industrial waste for nine years.
news_original_title: Voimalaitos johdatti jätevesiä hulevesiviemäriin 9 vuotta Naantalissa – asennusvirhe paljastui nyt
news_text: Between 2016 and 2017, an installation error occurred in the dual-fuel unit at the Naantali power plant, resulting in toilet water being incorrectly channeled into the sewage system. This mistake has caused economic and industrial waste water to mix with toilet water for nine years. Additionally, industrial waste water from a newly installed flue-gas scrubber has also been improperly directed into the toilet drain. The situation was rectified upon detection, and authorities have been notified for further investigation.
